main event: On July 6, 1966, a civilian observer reported seeing a bright light moving in the sky in R III, Ohio for about 120 seconds.
interesting points: The object changed colors including green, white, red, and blue., The reported movement was in a northwesterly direction., The object appeared brighter than the surrounding area., The phenomenon was reported at approximately 9:02 AM., There were no photographs included in the record.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
